name: hyperass
description:
A model for thick bottom waifus or semi-realistic characters. This model tends to produce hourglass figured ladies compared to my bottomheavy model.

Hyperfusion is the successor to this model, I suggest giving it a try

V3 Info:

v3 now uses LoRA! Edit: A1111 now supports LoRA models with the latest version. Use the following extension in Automatic1111 to load LoRA models https://github.com/kohya-ss/sd-webui-additional-networks


What changed since v2? It's the same dataset as v2, but trained with LoRA at a higher resolution of 768. Honestly this version was just a test to see how well LoRA training worked, but it turned out so well, I decided to release it.

Mixes incredibly well with AbyssOrange at 80-90% strength! Examples are all on AbyssOrange

Tips:

  • Place "huge" before "hyperass ass" to add extra emphasis

  • If you want front facing shots, dont use "hyperass ass", use "(thick thighs, wide hips)" instead

modelVersions.name: v3 LoRA
modelVersions.description:
This version is a LoRA model.
A1111 now has support for LoRA models!

Unlike my latest Hyperbreasts release, I kept this one simple with only one keyword "hyperass". The same keyword as previous versions.


Training Details:

  • 800 images

  • 43 epocs

  • learning rate 1e-4

  • only Unet training

  • total batch 16

  • base model Av3

  • clip skip 2

  • random flip

  • bucketing at 768

  • LoRA dim 4 (yes only 4)

modelVersions.name: v2
modelVersions.description:
v2 has a cleaner dataset, and better overall quality. Trained for much longer at a lower learning rate 5e-7. Dreambooth model

Training details:

  • 850 images

  • learning rate 5e-7

  • steps 80k

  • batch 4

  • base model: AnythingV3

  • transforms: left right flip

  • No class or class images used
